publications.title: Efficient Deep Learning Models for Natural Language Understanding
publications.venue: Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS)
publications.abstract: We propose a novel architecture for natural language understanding that achieves state-of-the-art performance while reducing computational requirements by 40%. Our approach combines attention mechanisms with efficient sparse transformers.
publications.citation: Nguyen, D.L., Smith, J., & Doe, J. (2023). Efficient Deep Learning Models for Natural Language Understanding. In NeurIPS 2023.

publications.title: Scalable Microservices Architecture: Patterns and Best Practices
publications.venue: IEEE International Conference on Software Engineering (ICSE)
publications.abstract: This paper presents a comprehensive study of microservices architecture patterns, analyzing their trade-offs in real-world production environments. We introduce novel monitoring and debugging techniques for distributed systems.
publications.citation: Nguyen, D.L., & Johnson, A. (2023). Scalable Microservices Architecture: Patterns and Best Practices. In ICSE 2023.

publications.title: Transfer Learning for Low-Resource Languages in Machine Translation
publications.abstract: We investigate transfer learning techniques for improving machine translation quality in low-resource language pairs. Our method leverages multilingual pre-training and achieves significant improvements over baseline models.
publications.citation: Nguyen, D.L., Garcia, M., & Wei, C. (2022). Transfer Learning for Low-Resource Languages in Machine Translation. In ACL 2022.

publications.title: Real-time Stream Processing with Apache Kafka and Flink
publications.abstract: This paper explores design patterns and performance optimizations for real-time stream processing systems using Apache Kafka and Flink. We present case studies from production deployments handling billions of events daily.
publications.citation: Nguyen, D.L., & Brown, R. (2022). Real-time Stream Processing with Apache Kafka and Flink. Journal of Big Data, 9(1), 1-24.

publications.title: Attention Mechanisms in Computer Vision: A Comprehensive Survey
publications.venue: IEEE Transactions on Pattern Analysis and Machine Intelligence (TPAMI)
publications.abstract: We provide a comprehensive survey of attention mechanisms in computer vision, categorizing different approaches and analyzing their effectiveness across various tasks. The paper includes performance benchmarks and implementation guidelines.
publications.citation: Nguyen, D.L., Lee, S., & Zhang, M. (2022). Attention Mechanisms in Computer Vision: A Comprehensive Survey. IEEE TPAMI, 44(10), 6789-6812.

publications.title: Federated Learning for Privacy-Preserving Healthcare Applications
publications.venue: International Conference on Medical Image Computing (MICCAI)
publications.abstract: We propose a federated learning framework for healthcare applications that preserves patient privacy while enabling collaborative model training across institutions. Our approach demonstrates strong performance on medical imaging tasks.
publications.citation: Nguyen, D.L., Davis, E., & Wilson, J. (2021). Federated Learning for Privacy-Preserving Healthcare Applications. In MICCAI 2021.
